Initial Seeding of a large amount of data, so please set your torrents to seed at the highest possible rate. That way you will be able to download faster by creating more seeds.....

Many thanks
Anyone managed to locate subs?  I've been searching high and low.

The BBC are currently screening S03 episodes (up to S03E08 currently). Just put in "engrenages bbc" into TPB search box above and you will get each episode with English language subs hard coded. Outstanding drama. Series 4,5 & 6 have been ordered.
